R

RelativePathResolver - Class in info.kwarc.krextor
This is a custom URI resolver for relative paths.
RelativePathResolver() - Constructor for class info.kwarc.krextor.RelativePathResolver
 
resolve(String, String) - Method in class info.kwarc.krextor.RelativePathResolver
Resolves the relative URL href against base using resolvePath
resolvePath(String, String) - Static method in class info.kwarc.krextor.RelativePathResolver
Resolves a relative path against a base path, regardless of whether any one of them exists.
